headline: Marriott (MAR) Margin Slide Reinforces Investor Concerns Despite 26% Revenue Growth Forecast
summary: Marriott International (MAR) is forecasting robust revenue growth of 26.2% per year, well ahead of the US market average of 10.5%. However, net profit margins have slipped to 35.1% from 42.1% last year, and earnings are projected to rise by 10.13% per year, trailing the estimated 16% annual profit growth for the broader US market. While the company’s shares currently trade at $272.24, above the estimated fair value of $253.31, investors will likely focus on the contrast between strong revenue...
